data.title: ROS News for the Week of December 2nd, 2025
data.description: ROS News for the Week of December 2nd, 2025     ROSCon 2025 videos are now available! If you want a quick summary of the event I put together ROSCon 2025 Recap for the OpenCV Weekly Webinar.       For Giving Tuesday we put together a new campaign for ROS users to become a become a Build Farm Backer. If you’ve every saved a few minutes by running sudo apt install ros-kilted-* instead of compiling from source we would love it if you helped cover our compute costs. Also, for the first time ever, we...
